tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    product_id UUID,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    blockchain_reference VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    product_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    review TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
 );

CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    product_id UUID,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT,
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    price DECIMAL,
    stock_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    block_number INT,
    previous_hash TEXT,
    hash TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerReviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  rating INT,
  review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  address TEXT,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE Blockchain (
  block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hash_value VARCHAR(64),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  transaction_id INT,
  previous_block_id INT
);
